original: “Bhante nāgasena, ‘agadassa dve aṅgāni gahetabbānī’ti yaṁ vadesi, katamāni tāni dve aṅgāni gahetabbānī”ti.
analyzed: bhante nāgasena agadassa dve aṅgāni gahetabbāni iti yam vadesi katamāni tāni dve aṅgāni gahetabbāni iti
yathā mahā rāja agade kimī na saṇṭhahanti

original: evameva kho, mahārāja, yoginā yogāvacarena mānase kilesā na saṇṭhapetabbā.
analyzed: evam eva kho mahā rāja yoginā yogāvacarena mānase kilesāḥ na saṇṭhapetabbā

original: Idaṁ, mahārāja, agadassa paṭhamaṁ aṅgaṁ gahetabbaṁ.
analyzed: idam mahā rāja agadassa paṭhamam aṅgam

original: Puna caparaṁ, mahārāja, agado daṭṭhaphuṭṭhadiṭṭhaasitapītakhāyitasāyitaṁ sabbaṁ visaṁ paṭihanati;
analyzed: puna capara mahā rāja agadaḥ daṭṭha phuṭṭha diṭṭha asita pīta khāyita sāyitam sabbam visam paṭihanati

original: evameva kho, mahārāja, yoginā yogāvacarena rāgadosamohamānadiṭṭhivisaṁ sabbaṁ paṭihanitabbaṁ.
analyzed: evam eva kho mahā rāja yoginā yogāvacarena rāga dosa moha māna diṭṭhi visam sabbam paṭihanitabba

original: Idaṁ, mahārāja, agadassa dutiyaṁ aṅgaṁ gahetabbaṁ.
analyzed: ida mahā rāja agadassa dutiyam aṅgam
